## RedeemableERC20DeployArgs interface

Everything required by the `RedeemableERC20` constructor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RedeemableERC20DeployArgs 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [distributionEndForwardingAddress](./rain-sdk.redeemableerc20deployargs.distributionendforwardingaddress.md) | string | Optional address to send rTKN to at the end of the distribution phase. If <code>0</code> address then all undistributed rTKN will burn itself at the end of the distribution. |
|  [erc20Config](./rain-sdk.redeemableerc20deployargs.erc20config.md) | [ERC20Config](./rain-sdk.erc20config.md) | ERC20 config forwarded to the ERC20 constructor. |
|  [minimumTier](./rain-sdk.redeemableerc20deployargs.minimumtier.md) | BigNumberish | Minimum tier required for transfers in <code>Phase.ZERO</code>. Can be <code>0</code>. |
|  [reserve](./rain-sdk.redeemableerc20deployargs.reserve.md) | string | Reserve token that the associated <code>Trust</code> or equivalent raise contract will be forwarding to the <code>RedeemableERC20</code> contract. |
|  [tier](./rain-sdk.redeemableerc20deployargs.tier.md) | string | Tier contract to compare statuses against on transfer. |
